summary: This Separation Agreement dated November 1, 2025, between ECD Automotive Design, Inc. and Emily Humble, outlines the terms of Humble's termination, including severance pay of $172,000, equity issuance, and COBRA premium payments for six months. In exchange, Humble agrees to release the company from any claims related to her employment or termination.
